abstract.p: Hydroflux conditions provide access to oxohydroxoferrates A 2[Fe 2O 3(OH) 2] with A=K, Rb, Cs. Hydrogen bonds inside and between layers of corner‚Äêsharing [FeO 3OH] tetrahedra strongly influence decomposition temperatures, crystal structures and morphologies. The magnetic moments of the iron(III) cations are aligned antiparallel in neighboring tetrahedra.
